short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Meta Pixel validator Chrome extension: Optimize Facebook pixel. Debug & test pixel, check for errors, track user activity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meta Pixel Validator Chrome extension designed to help verify that tracking pixels are installed correctly on their website. With this tool, you can easily check if your tracking pixels are firing properly and ensure that your analytics data is accurate. 

 
How to Use Meta Pixel Validator? 

>> Install the extension from the Google Chrome Web Store. 

>> Navigate to the webpage you want to check. 

>> Click on the Meta Pixel Validator icon in the Chrome toolbar. 

>> The extension will display a list of all the tracking pixels on the page, along with their status. 

>> Click on each tracking pixel to view more details, such as the pixel ID, firing status, and any errors or warnings. 

>> Use this information to troubleshoot any issues with your tracking pixels and ensure that they are installed correctly. 

 

Key Features 

>>Supports a wide range of tracking pixels: It supports all the major tracking pixels used by popular platforms like Facebook 

>>Detailed tracking pixel information: The extension provides detailed information about each tracking pixel, including its ID, firing status, and any errors or warnings. 

>>Easy-to-use interface: It is designed with a simple and intuitive interface that makes it easy to navigate and use. 

>>Saves time and effort: By quickly identifying any issues with your tracking pixels, It can save you time and effort by helping you avoid costly mistakes and ensure that your analytics data is accurate. 

>>Free and open-source: It is a free and open-source extension, which means that anyone can use it without any cost or restrictions.
